actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to delay the effective date of certain proposed amendments to the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure and certain other rules promulgated by the U.S. Supreme Court.

summary.text: Delays the effective date of specified rules and amendments to the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure promulgated by the Supreme Court.

titles.title: A bill to delay the effective date of certain proposed amendments to the Federal Rules of Criminal Procedure and certain other rules promulgated by the U.S. Supreme Court.
